41138.name: Youth literacy rate, population 15-24 years, gender parity index (GPI)
41138.description: Ratio of female youth literacy rate to male youth literacy rate. It is calculated by dividing the female value for the indicator by the male value for the indicator. A GPI equal to 1 indicates parity between females and males. In general, a value less than 1 indicates disparity in favor of males and a value greater than 1 indicates disparity in favor of females.
41138.s_name: World Bank EdStats: Youth literacy rate, population 15-24 years, gender parity index (GPI)
